header.title: Alice for Crypto Finance
header.lead1: Most effective way to increase your crypto assets
header.lead2: Save crypto & Earn annual interest of 8%

services.title: Services
services.service1.title: Exchange - 0% Fee
services.service1.desc: Have you paid unfair fees for crypto exchanges? You don't need to anymore.
services.service2.title: Savings - 8% APR
services.service2.desc: Deposit stable coins and get annual interest of 8% continuously.
services.service3.title: Instant Loan - 3 seconds
services.service3.desc: Borrow stable coins instantly with the lowest interest rate. Coins are offered instantly.
services.service4.title: Custody - Decentralized
services.service4.desc: Only YOU can get access to your assets so they belong to you at any time.

features.feature1.title: Secured by blockchain
features.feature1.desc: Alice is backed by its own blockchain. It protects your assets at the highest level of security.
features.feature2.title: Intuitive and convenient
features.feature2.desc: It offers the best user experience for trading, borrowing and lending assets.
features.feature3.title: Super performant
features.feature3.desc: DPoS consensus algorithm, which operates Alice's blockchain, provides both security and performance.

contentFirst.title: Compound Savings of 8% APR
contentFirst.desc: Alice offers savings service to help you increase your assets most effectively. Deposit DAI stable coins and get 8% of APR every year. There's no limit to the amount of deposit and you can withdraw your savings at any time if you want! (APR : Annual Percentage Rate)

contentSecond.title: Instant Loan in 3 seconds
contentSecond.desc: With Alice, you can get an instant loan in less than 3 seconds. Deposit tokens that you believe whose price will increase as collateral. Get paid for your DAI stable coins and use it now!

contentThird.title: Exchange with ZERO fee
contentThird.desc: Are you still paying for fees while trading cryptocurrency? You don't have to anymore. Alice doesn't charge you fees. Trade with ZERO fee!
